outputs_restore_state.title: Restore Last Outputs State After Power On

en.mode_description: For using button mapping-matrix firmware v1.17.0 or newer is required
en.baud_rate_description: Make sure that communication with device is established before changing this parameter. Select required baud rate, save configuration and then change port baud rate to the same value.
en.lp_hold_time_description: If press is longer than the specified time then it is long
en.dp_time_description: If there is no second press during the specified time then press is single. 0 - disables all presses except short and long
en.debounce_time_description: Must be 5-10 times less than double press time. If double presses are disabled - any value
